Film o kofeinie:
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Z7MMG6fKOL4

===
Timeline:
0:00 Energetyki tylko dla dorosłych
1:33 Czy młodzież pijała energetyki
2:50 Kofeina
5:20 Cukier (i kofeina)
7:34 Tauryna
9:28 Suma
10:41 Podsumowanie z elementami opinii

===
Źródła (wybrane):

N. Marmorstein - Energy Drink and Coffee Consumption and Psychopathology Symptoms Among Early Adolescents: Cross-Sectional and Longitudinal Associations
D. Schuttler i in. - Impact of energy drink versus coffee consumption on periodic repolarization dynamics: an interventional study
X. Chen i in. - New concerns on caffeine consumption and the impact of potential regulations: The case of energy drinks
C. Ajibo i in. - Consumption of energy drinks by children and young people: a systematic review examining evidence of physical effects and consumer attitudes
J. White jr.
title: Energetyki 18+, czy to ma sens?
